pr_title: fix: implement NAME Tracker Identifier scheme

timeline.message:
fix: implement NAME Tracker Identifier scheme

Adds the `NAME` Tracker Identifier scheme that allows Tracker Import to fetch metadata by the `name` attribute.
This PR also:

- adds a comprehensive integration test that verifies that all available Tracker Identifiers are working with all the IdScheme
- fix a bug in `TrackerIdentifierCollecor` that prevented the correct pre-heating of Category Option

timeline.author: stian-sandvold
